item.title: Watch a directory for creation of new files and notify on slack
item.description: How did I came up with this? simply because, I needed to inform marketing team whenever there is a new csv uploaded. So initially we used to watch directory on daily bases whether new CSV uploaded. That was super boring so I thought to automate this process. I found out that inotify can help me to achieve this. So, let’s do it. Install inotify This library provides a thin layer on top of the basic inotify interface.
